item.description:
Tokyo Hacker Girls„Å∏„Çà„ÅÜ„Åì„Åù„ÄúÔºÅ

Welcome to our VTuber Tech Blog!

Hello everyone! üéâ

We‚Äôre Cyan Nyan and Asahi Lina, and we‚Äôre excited to welcome you to our very first blog post! I (Cyan) am a former Googler, illustrator, aspiring singer, and dreamer, while Lina is a talented VTuber known for her impressive work in technology and her role in developing GPU drivers for the Asahi Linux project. Together, as part of the Tokyo Hacker Girls, we‚Äôre thrilled to share our journey in the tech and VTuber communities.

Our Vision

Our goal is to create a warm and inclusive community filled with love, creativity, and knowledge-sharing. We hope to inspire others by sharing what we‚Äôve learned over the years, and to provide a space where everyone can learn, connect, and support one another. We believe in building a community where both tech and VTuber fans can feel at home and be a part of our journey.

What to Expect

Here‚Äôs a glimpse of what we are going to write about:

  1. VTuber Tech & Community: We will write about the latest trends and tools that enhance our VTuber experience.
  2. Personal Tech Insights: Lina will share her experience with advanced programming languages (Rust, Python, C) through her reverse engineering and open-source projects.
  3. Knowledge Sharing: Cyan will provide useful VTuber tips, covering VTuber tools, UI/UX for YouTube streams, and community building.
  4. Cyan‚Äôs Life Stories: Cyan will share stories about her life with Lina, their dreams, and how they grow every day while facing challenges together.
  5. Cyan‚Äôs Recipes: Cyan‚Äôs special, maid-inspired recipes that will change your life!
  6. Diaries: Personal reflections and experiences from our journey.
  7. Cute Stuff: Fun, adorable content to brighten your day.
  8. Artwork Gallery: Showcasing our art and that of talented creators.
  9. Minigames: Interactive games to enjoy during streams.
  10. Interactive 3D Kitten: Because who doesn‚Äôt love a cute kitten?

How to Reach Us

We‚Äôd love to hear from you! Whether it‚Äôs feedback, questions, or just a quick hello, feel free to reach out through email or our Marshmallow Q&A platform. We‚Äôre here to connect and chat with our community!

  • Cyan speaks both English and Simplified Chinese.
  • Lina speaks both English and Japanese.

Both of us have over 10 years of overseas experience, and we‚Äôre excited to connect with fans from around the world.

Coming Up Next: How We Met üíû

In our next post, we‚Äôll share the story of how we met and began this exciting journey together. It‚Äôs a tale of tech, passion, and a lot of late-night conversations, and we can‚Äôt wait to let you in on it!

This structure makes your blog welcoming, informative, and gives readers a sense of what to expect, how to communicate with you, and a sneak peek into the next post. Let me know if you‚Äôd like any more ideas or a deeper dive into any section!

item.description:
Meet the heroines!

Asahi Lina

Lina is a Linux developer VTuber who spends most of her time working on the Asahi Linux project. She developed the world’s first Linux GPU driver written in Rust.

In her spare time, she likes playing the piano and making music.

Cyan Nyan

Tensai Neko C++ Yuri Queen (A.K.A. Asahi Lina’s fiancee, for real)
